name: Alice
title: alice.tech
shortDescription: Alice is an AI-powered study tool designed to enhance learning efficiency for students. It converts uploaded study materials into tailored notes, summaries, and interactive exercises. Ideal for students who want to test their knowledge through quizzes and receive instant feedback. For example, a student can upload lecture slides and receive customized practice questions.
cons: Dependent on quality of uploaded content
Potential privacy concerns with data handling

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Quizlet
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers study sets and learning modes
